greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: row n contains numbers with sum of digits = n, and not greater than the n-th repunit (cf. A007953 and A002275).
comment: Number of terms in row n = A242622(n);
for n > 0: number of repdigit terms in row n = A242627(n).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 0..8 of table, flattened
mathematica: Join[{0},Flatten[Table[Select[Range[FromDigits[PadRight[{},n,1]]], Total[ IntegerDigits[ #]] == n&],{n,5}]]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 08 2019 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 16 2014
